level.text: An applicant requesting approval of a Master Plan application shall provide:
A written description of the proposal, including a description of how the Master Plan review criteria are met; and
A plan or plans encompassing the entire USN District and showing:
The location and dimensions of private rights-of-way and alleys;
The lot areas to be used for FAR calculations, both for the entire USN District as well as the north and south buildings, pursuant to ยง 2909;
The general locations of plazas, parks, or other open spaces;
The general locations of sites for future building units; and
Any other information needed to understand the project.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4804 (June 3, 2011).
